name: LazPaint Image
summary: Learn about .LZP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create an LZP file, select File → Save or Save as..., name the file, choose the save location, select the LZP extension from the "Save as type" drop down menu, and click Save.
To open an LZP file, you can double-click the file or select File → Open..., choose your file, and click Open.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
